content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to get a text summary of an article on the National Geographic website, but received an error message.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "interesting resources related to exploration and learning"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.naeyc.org/resources/pubs/yc/may2019/outdoor-play-is-essential", "https://www.schools.nyc.gov/learning/special-education/family-resources", "https://www.noaa.gov/education/resource-collections/ocean-coasts/ocean-floor-features", "https://www.nationalgeographic.org/article/history-space-exploration/", "https://oceanexplorer.noaa.gov/edu/welcome.html", "https://www.nasa.gov/exploration/whyweexplore/why_we_explore_main.html", "https://oceanexplorer.noaa.gov/edu/multimedia-resources/multimedia-resources.html", "https://openreview.net/forum?id=W1MUJv5zaXP"]', type='action_result')]
"""
